Description:
CN.CMG.220222.A-312301774
You have failed to ensure that lifting operations involving lifting equipment, specifically the lifting of nets into the net store via a forklift truck, are properly planned by a competent person, appropriately supervised and carried out in a safe manner.
You should remedy the said contravention in the manner stated in the schedule (CN.CMG.220222.A) which forms part of this Notice.
